headline: The Stock Market Has a ‘Breadth’ Problem
summary: The poor breadth is a sign the market is growing nervous about several related risks—tariffs chief among them.

raw.headline: The Stock Market Has a ‘Breadth’ Problem
raw.summary: The poor breadth is a sign the market is growing nervous about several related risks—tariffs chief among them.

headline: Trump Aims Tariff Double Whammy at Industries, Nations by Aug. 1
summary: (Bloomberg) -- President Donald Trump is readying plans for industry-specific tariffs to kick in alongside his country-by-country duties in two weeks, ramping up his push to reshape the US’s standing in the global trading system by penalizing purchases from abroad.Most Read from BloombergThe Dutch Intersection Is Coming to Save Your LifeMumbai Facelift Is Inspired by 200-Year-Old New York BlueprintAdvocates Fear US Agents Are Using ‘Wellness Checks’ on Children as a Prelude to ArrestsLA Homeless

headline: Tesla finally launches in India, but the world’s third largest car market has been a graveyard for western brands
summary: “None of the other brands that all had big hopes when entering the market have had any success," says PwC Autofacts analyst Steven van Arsdale.

headline: Is Ford Stock a Buy Now?
summary: Ford reported a 14.2% jump in Q2 unit sales, driven by pricing incentives to lure in customers.  Shares of the automaker trade at a cheap P/E ratio of 9.4, and the dividend yield of 5.12% is high.  You'd struggle to find a lot of companies that have stood the test of time like Ford Motor Company (NYSE: F) has.

raw.headline: Is Ford Stock a Buy Now?

You'd struggle to find a lot of companies that have stood the test of time like Ford Motor Company (NYSE: F) has.

headline: This Ford model is the most popular used vehicle in Tennessee, according to study. See why
summary: Used vehicles are much more popular than new vehicles due to lower prices. This Ford is the most popular used vehicle in the state of Tennessee.

headline: Ford recalls 694K Bronco Sport, Escape SUVs for cracked fuel injectors
summary: The issue can result in a gas leak on models equipped with 1.5L engines, which can lead to an underhood fire.

headline: China Spy Agency Accuses Foreign Agents of Stealing Rare Earths
